path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Iosiro-1inch Network Limit Order Protocol Smart Contract Audit.pdf

findings.title: Rounding error leads to additional assets taken from order taker
findings.description: The AmountCalculator.getTakerAmount() function calculates the ceiling amount to be taken from the order taker, which can lead to additional assets being taken beyond the order specification due to rounding errors.
